info.author: Eur Ing Christopher Thoday
info.description:
General purpose IDE with support for Python and 14 other languages. Applies to
whole project not just source code. Currently only available for Linux.
Extensive context-sensitive help. Antidote to Emacs and Vi fanatics. Many
additional features commonly missing from other IDEs but lacks call tips and
code completion.

info.name: Luke-SDK
info.summary: Source Browser and Software Developers Toolkit
info.html_description: General purpose IDE with support for Python and 14 other languages. Applies to whole project not just source code. Currently only available for Linux. Extensive context-sensitive help. Antidote to Emacs and Vi fanatics. Many additional features commonly missing from other IDEs but lacks call tips and code completion.
